header.title: {year} Personal Tax Return (T1)
header.description: Complete your T1 General Tax Return accurately.

questions.label: Who are you filing taxes for this year?
questions.name: filingSetup.type
questions.helpText: Select 'Myself and others' if you want to include your spouse's income or dependents who earned income this year

questions.label: Are you including your spouse's income in this filing?
questions.name: filingSetup.includeSpouse
questions.helpText: If you're married or common-law and want to include your spouse's income, select Yes

questions.label: How many of your dependents earned income this year?
questions.name: filingSetup.numEarningDependents

validation.message: SIN must be 9 digits in format XXX-XXX-XXX or XXXXXXXXX

questions.label: Province Resided In (for selected tax year)
questions.name: residency.provinceResided

questions.label: Have you lived outside of Canada in the selected tax year for more than 6 months?
questions.name: residency.livedOutsideCanada

questions.label: Did you become a resident of Canada in the selected tax year?
questions.name: residency.becameResidentThisYear

questions.label: Last 3 years net world income (converted to CAD) - for benefit applications
questions.name: residency.worldIncome

questions.label: Marital status in the selected tax year
questions.name: maritalStatus.status

questions.label: Did your marital status change during the selected tax year?
questions.name: maritalStatus.changed

questions.label: Did your spouse/partner become a resident of Canada in the selected tax year?
questions.name: spouse.becameResidentThisYear

questions.label: Spouse/Partner Date Became Resident of Canada
questions.name: spouse.dateBecameResident

questions.label: Spouse/Partner Net Income
questions.name: spouse.netIncome
questions.helpText: If you and your spouse are filing your taxes together with us, we will calculate the net income. Please leave this field blank.

questions.label: Is your spouse/partner's address the same as yours?
questions.name: spouse.sameAddress

questions.label: Dependant Details
questions.name: dependants.list
questions.helpText: Please add all your dependants (children, elderly parents, or family members who rely on you for support).

fields.name: becameResidentThisYear
fields.label: Did this dependent become a resident of Canada in the selected tax year?

fields.name: earnsIncome
fields.label: Does this dependant earn any income?

fields.name: netIncome
fields.label: Dependant's Net Income
fields.helpText: Enter the dependant's total net income for the tax year

questions.label: Authorize CRA to share your name, address, date of birth, and citizenship with Elections Canada?
questions.name: electionsCanada.authorizeCRA
questions.helpText: Only applicable if you are a Canadian resident.

questions.label: Consent to be added to the National Register of Electors?
questions.name: electionsCanada.consentRegister

questions.label: Did you purchase a principal residence this year?
questions.name: propertyAssets.purchasedPrincipalResidence

questions.label: Upload purchase documents (Agreement of Purchase, Lawyer invoice, Land transfer tax receipt, Title insurance receipt)
questions.name: propertyAssets.purchaseDocuments

questions.label: Did you dispose of a principal residence this year?
questions.name: propertyAssets.disposedPrincipalResidence

questions.label: Upload sale documents (Agreement of Purchase and Sale, Lawyer invoice, Land transfer tax receipt, Title insurance receipt)
questions.name: propertyAssets.disposalDocuments

questions.label: Did you own foreign property costing more than CAD $100,000?
questions.name: propertyAssets.foreignPropertyOver100k

questions.label: Upload purchase agreement or deed for foreign property
questions.name: propertyAssets.foreignPropertyDocuments

questions.label: Did you have an interest in a foreign affiliate?
questions.name: propertyAssets.foreignAffiliate
questions.helpText: (Income earned from a non-Canadian company that you own a significant share of)

questions.label: Upload foreign affiliate documents (Legal name, Country of incorporation, Business address, Nature of business, Date ownership started, Dividend statements, Management fees, Interest payments, Foreign tax paid, Annual financial statements)
questions.name: propertyAssets.foreignAffiliateDocuments

questions.label: Are you applying for the Disability Tax Credit?
questions.name: disabilityCredit.affectedPersons

questions.label: Full name of dependant claiming disability credit
questions.name: disabilityCredit.dependantName

questions.label: Upload Disability Documents (Approved T2201 form, CRA approval letter - if available)
questions.name: disabilityCredit.documents

questions.label: Select all income sources that apply to you
questions.name: income.sources
questions.helpText: If any of the below slips are already in CRA, it is not necessary to upload.

questions.label: Upload T4 Slips (Employment Income)
questions.name: income.employmentDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload your T4 slips from employers

questions.label: Upload Self-Employment / Business Documents
questions.name: income.selfEmploymentDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload invoices, expense receipts, and business records

questions.label: Upload Rental Income Documents
questions.name: income.rentalDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload rental agreements, expense receipts, and income statements

questions.label: Upload T5/T3 Slips (Investment Income)
questions.name: income.investmentDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload T5 and T3 slips from banks and investment accounts

questions.label: Upload Capital Gains Documents
questions.name: income.capitalGainsDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload sale statements, purchase records, and brokerage statements

questions.label: Upload Foreign Income Documents
questions.name: income.foreignIncomeDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload foreign income statements and tax documents

questions.label: Upload T4E Slip (Employment Insurance)
questions.name: income.eiDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload your T4E slip from Service Canada

questions.label: Upload T4A(P) Slip (CPP)
questions.name: income.cppDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload your T4A(P) slip for Canada Pension Plan benefits

questions.label: Upload T4A(OAS) Slip (Old Age Security)
questions.name: income.oasDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload your T4A(OAS) slip for Old Age Security benefits

questions.label: Upload Government Benefits Documents
questions.name: income.govBenefitsDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload slips for other government benefits received

questions.label: Upload T4A Slip (Scholarships/Grants)
questions.name: income.scholarshipDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload T4A slips for scholarships, bursaries, or grants

questions.label: Upload T2202 Slip (Tuition)
questions.name: income.tuitionDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload T2202 tuition and education amounts certificate

questions.label: Upload Support Payment Documents
questions.name: income.supportPaymentDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload court orders or agreements for support payments received

questions.label: Upload Other Income Documents
questions.name: income.otherIncomeDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload any other income-related documents

questions.label: Select Deductions & Credits that apply
questions.name: deductions.sources

options.label: None of the above apply to me

questions.helpText: Select all deductions that apply, or choose 'None of the above' if none apply

questions.label: Did you have any work-related expenses this year?
questions.name: workExpenses.categories

options.label: Purchased supplies or other work-related expenses

questions.label: Upload T2200 Form from Employer
questions.name: workExpenses.t2200Document
questions.helpText: Required if claiming work-related expenses

questions.label: Upload Receipts for Supplies / Work-Related Expenses
questions.name: workExpenses.suppliesReceipts
questions.helpText: Upload receipts for supplies, tools, or other work-related purchases

questions.label: Select work expense categories (upload receipts or enter values)
questions.name: workExpenses.expenseTypes

questions.label: Total size of your house/apartment (sq ft)
questions.name: homeOffice.totalHomeSize
questions.helpText: We need this to calculate the portion of your home used for work.

questions.label: Size of area used for work (sq ft)
questions.name: homeOffice.workAreaSize

questions.label: Monthly Rent (if renting)
questions.name: homeOffice.monthlyRent
questions.helpText: Enter the total monthly amount. We will calculate the work-from-home portion.

questions.label: Other eligible home office expenses (Specify)
questions.name: homeOffice.otherExpensesDescription
questions.placeholder: Describe any other eligible home office expenses
questions.helpText: Enter any other eligible home office expenses not listed above

questions.label: N/A - I do not have a vehicle for work-related travel
questions.name: vehicleExpenses.notApplicable
questions.helpText: Check this box if you do not use a personal vehicle for work-related travel. If checked, you can skip the vehicle details below.

questions.label: Total KM Driven in selected tax year
questions.name: vehicleExpenses.kmDrivenThisYear

questions.label: Undepreciated Capital Cost (UCC) at start of year (from last year T777, leave blank if unknown)
questions.name: vehicleExpenses.uccStartOfYear
questions.helpText: Used to calculate depreciation expenses of the vehicle

questions.label: Annual Fuel (gas / diesel / charging costs)
questions.name: vehicleExpenses.annualFuel
questions.helpText: Enter the total annual amounts. We will calculate the work-related portion.

questions.label: Annual Interest on Car Loan (if owning)
questions.name: vehicleExpenses.annualLoanInterest

questions.label: Do you need bookkeeping services, or will you enter amounts manually?
questions.name: selfEmployment.needsBookkeeping

options.label: I need bookkeeping services (upload your documents and we'll handle the rest)

questions.helpText: Choose bookkeeping if you want us to calculate your expenses from your documents

questions.label: Select business expense categories and enter amounts
questions.name: selfEmployment.expenseCategories
questions.helpText: Select each expense category and enter the total amount for the year

questions.label: Upload business expense receipts (optional)
questions.name: selfEmployment.expenseDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload receipts to support your expense amounts entered above. The CRA can request receipts for up to seven years, so please keep your receipts for at least seven years.

questions.label: Did you purchase equipment for business in the last 5 years?
questions.name: selfEmployment.hasCapitalAssets

questions.label: Upload business documents (Invoices, Bank statements, Receipts)
questions.name: selfEmployment.businessDocuments
questions.helpText: Upload invoices, bank statements, and receipts. The CRA can request receipts for up to seven years, so please keep your receipts for at least seven years.

questions.label: Do you use a vehicle for your self-employment business?
questions.name: selfEmployment.usesVehicleForBusiness
questions.helpText: Claim vehicle expenses used for business purposes

questions.label: Kilometres Driven
questions.name: selfEmployment.vehicleForBusiness
questions.helpText: Business use % is calculated automatically from km driven

questions.label: Depreciation
questions.name: selfEmployment.vehicleForBusiness
questions.helpText: Used to calculate depreciation expenses. Leave blank if unknown.

fields.name: uccStartOfYear
fields.label: Undepreciated Capital Cost (UCC) at start of year

questions.label: Annual Vehicle Expenses
questions.name: selfEmployment.vehicleForBusiness
questions.helpText: Enter total annual amounts - business portion will be calculated

questions.label: Do you have a home office for your self-employment business?
questions.name: selfEmployment.hasHomeOffice
questions.helpText: Claim home office expenses if you work from home

questions.label: Home Office Size
questions.name: selfEmployment.homeOfficeExpenses
questions.helpText: The business use % is calculated from office size / total home size

questions.label: Housing Costs (Monthly)
questions.name: selfEmployment.homeOfficeExpenses
questions.helpText: Enter monthly amounts - business portion calculated automatically

questions.label: Other Utilities (Monthly)
questions.name: selfEmployment.homeOfficeExpenses
questions.helpText: e.g., Cable, Security system, etc.

questions.label: Other Home Office Expenses (Monthly)
questions.name: selfEmployment.homeOfficeExpenses
questions.helpText: Any other eligible home office expenses not listed above

questions.label: Was the property rented for the full year?
questions.name: rentalIncome.rentedFullYear

questions.label: Total Rent Received During the Year
questions.name: rentalIncome.totalRentReceived
questions.helpText: All rent received must be reported, even if paid in cash.

questions.label: Select Rental Expenses and enter amounts
questions.name: rentalIncome.expenseCategories
questions.helpText: Select each expense category and enter the total amount for the year

questions.label: Do you want to claim depreciation (CCA) on the rental property?
questions.name: rentalIncome.claimCCA
questions.helpText: Claiming CCA can reduce tax now but may increase tax when the property is sold.

questions.label: Total Home Size (sq ft) - if partial rental
questions.name: rentalIncome.totalHomeSize

questions.label: Upload Rental Documents (Lease, Mortgage statement, Property tax bill, Insurance, Receipts, Purchase documents)
questions.name: rentalIncome.documents

questions.label: Equipment for Rental Property (washing machine, dryer, etc. purchased within 5 years)
questions.name: rentalIncome.equipment

questions.label: Reason for the Move
questions.name: movingExpenses.reason

options.label: Started a new business or self-employment

questions.helpText: CRA rule: The new home must be at least 40 km closer to the new work or school.

questions.label: Date You Started Work / School at New Location
questions.name: movingExpenses.workStartDate

fields.name: tempAccommodation
fields.label: Temporary accommodation near new home (Maximum 15 days)

fields.name: legalFees
fields.label: Legal fees to sell old home

questions.label: Did you use a vehicle for moving?
questions.name: movingExpenses.usedVehicle

questions.label: Upload Moving Documents (Moving company invoice, Fuel receipts, Hotel bills, Lease termination, Legal statements, Mileage log)
questions.name: movingExpenses.documents

questions.label: Additional Documents
questions.name: documents.other
questions.helpText: Upload any other documents relevant to your return that haven't been uploaded yet (e.g., CRA correspondence, custody arrangements, etc.)

questions.label: Additional Notes
questions.name: additionalNotes
questions.helpText: If you have any additional information or special instructions for our tax team, please enter them here.
questions.placeholder: Enter any additional notes or special instructions for our team...

review.title: Review Your Filing
review.description: Please verify all details before proceeding to payment.

submitButton.label: Proceed to Payment
submitButton.confirmMessage: Are you sure all details are correct?
submitButton.successMessage: Filing details verified. Proceeding to payment...
